Plot: A look at the late '60s and early '70s rock band The Doors, including rare exclusive footage.
Title: The Doors: When You're Strange
Actors: Johnny Depp, John Densmore, Robby Krieger, Ray Manzarek
tomatoConsensus: It's far from a critical assessment of the band's music or its legacy, but When You're Strange gives fans a beautifully filmed, lovingly assembled tribute to the Doors.
